Package net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.widget.factory

Contains the API for widget factories.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractUiWidgetFactoryDatatype
    This is the abstract interface for a factory to create widgets for particular datatypes.
    AbstractUiWidgetFactoryNative
    This is the abstract interface for a factory used to create UiWidgets.
    UiSingleWidgetButtonFactory<HANDLER extends UiHandlerAction>
    This is the interface for a factory used to create a UiWidgetButton for a particular UiHandlerAction.
    UiSingleWidgetFactory<WIDGET extends UiWidget>
    This is the interface for a factory of a single UiWidget.
    UiSingleWidgetFactoryDatatype<VALUE>
    This is the interface for a UiSingleWidgetFactory to create a field widget for a particular datatype.
    UiSingleWidgetFactoryNative<WIDGET extends UiWidgetNative>
    This is the interface for a factory of a single UiWidget of a particular type.
    UiWidgetFactoryDatatype
    This is the interface for a factory to create widgets for particular datatypes.
    UiWidgetFactoryNative
    This is the interface for a generic factory used to create UiWidgets.

Package net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.widget.factory Description

Contains the API for widget factories.

Client UI API Widget Factory

This package contains the internal API for widget factories such as UiWidgetFactoryNative and UiWidgetFactoryDatatype. Everything is aggregated into UiWidgetFactory that should be used by end-users. The content of this package is for implementors of the API and should not directly be used by end-users.
Please consult Client UI API for an introduction.
